content:
{"name": "Purpose World Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": "We particularly focus on helping to feed all that are in need but not limited the following groups:

The elderly living on fixed incomes
Working families considered to be low-income
Individuals with medical or physical disabilities
Homeless and transient people
Individuals and families experiencing a temporary emergency (e.g. an illness, injury, or loss of employment)
The following documentation is needed and must be presented to receive food pantry service:
Proof of Gwinnett County residence (i.e. driver license, utility bill)
Proof of U.S. citizenship (i.e. birth certificate, alien registration card, passport)
Proof of possible income documents (ie. employer pay stub, SSI benefit letter, unemployment document, retirement/pension
* Please bring a copy of the documents that will be maintained in our secure data files.

Do you need Assistance?
If you need assistance, you need to download the application and submit it and supporting documentation. Please click on the button below to download the application and submit it. https://www.purposeworldchurch.com/purposeful-food-pantry/pre-registration-application-for-certification-and-eligibility-for-food-pantry-program/", "email": "", "url": "https://www.purposeworldchurch.com/purposeful-food-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1905 Highpoint Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Snellville", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30078", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8576028, "longitude": -84.0487314}, "phones": [{"number": "(762) 333-2630", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:30", "closes_at": "23:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Pre-registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration on website required"}]}
